website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and style combined, that is the TOMS Cabrillo sneakers. Available for both men and women, this low-top shoe from Blake Mycoskie’s sneaker brand obtained positive ratings as an excellent everyday go-to shoe from most buyers for its lightweight, stylish look and colors, and affordable price. Although stiff at first that a brief break-in period is needed, the TOMS Cabrillo shoe is still noted by most as overall comfortable on foot for everyday wear. Its flexibility is worth noting, too. However, minimal foot support can be expected.
pros: The TOMS Cabrillo made several purchasers satisfied with its overall comfort
Many reviewers appreciated that this shoe fits true to size
Most buyers observed that this shoe is lightweight
Some purchasers described it as beautiful, stylish, and perfect for everyday use
At least one purchaser appreciated that the Cabrillo shoes from TOMS aren’t crazy expensive
A few buyers liked that they could wear the TOMS Cabrillo with or without socks
Many reviewers applauded the versatility of this shoe because it looks good with everything
This low-top shoe offers numerous colorways
cons: The TOMS Cabrillo disappointed a few purchasers who were looking for more arch support
Some users noted that this shoe needs a brief break-in period as the materials can be a bit stiff out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Dont wash!
customer_reviews.text: Upon first sight and even wearing, I absolutely loved these shoes. Fast forward to them getting dirty and throwing them in the washer only to find the brown tags are poorly dyed and the dye has bled into all the surrounding canvas and shoe laces. They're now ruined, aesthetically speaking.
customer_reviews.author: Katura Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Nice style, stiff edges/tongue, arch support too far back
customer_reviews.text: Nice style. The arch feels strange, like it is in the wrong place. The removable insole is flat, so I thought the shoe construction might be to blame. However, I was able to insert a dr. scholl's arch support and it ended up being in the right spot. Debating whether to keep these or not. UPDATE: I wore these around the house for a few days and noticed the tongue is very stiff and puts pressure onto my ankle. It only happens on one foot, so it may or may not be bothersome to you. However, given the stiffness of the tongue, upper edges and the arch issue I have decided to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Brinn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes-So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST shoes. Wore them over 8 hours the first day. Wow! So comfortable. Very pleased with everything about the purchase and quality of the product. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MommyJo

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable and Good Support
customer_reviews.text: I am someone with a back injury due to a car accident and I have to stand at work for 8 to 10 hours. These shoes are super comfortable and give me good support through my shift. On top of that they look good. The one star off is due to qualify controlled. I don't know what's going with the shoe mold, but the right and left sole are not even. It only happen to grey color one. I know this because I also own a pair in dinem color, which doesn't have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: x3dgame

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky! But comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Toms are my favorite shoe ever. Every pair I own is comfortable. These sneakers are no exception. Usually I can’t wait to take my shoes off when I get home but withthese I find myself realizing I never took them off after being home a while. The only downfall to these is they are super squeaky which isn’t good when you’re trying to sneak out of a baby’s room haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable everyday walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I always love Toms products for their looks and comfort. I usually find that they always fit true to size however, it seems that these feel a bit more roomy than usual. I ordered a 7.5 (my normal size) and have a bit more toe room than I want. Either way, they don't slip out and I've received a bunch of compliments. I've been warned not to get these wet or dirty as the cleaning process seems impossible, so if you're looking for shoes to wear in all kinds of weather, avoid these.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes. Seem very comfortable, like my original toms. But I love the look of these shoes, more casual than your average tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amarks

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's more of a blue-grey than the picture seems to indicate to me (which looks more like a brown-grey) - which is what I was hoping for. It's not worth returning, as the shoe fits well and is still the style I was looking for. The laces are a bit stiff initially so they are sticking out in awkward ways. I hope as they get worn that will change.
customer_reviews.author: perogeez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT a fan.
customer_reviews.text: So I like the look of the shoe and the fit as well. However after walking for a bit in them I discovered the support was absolutely and utterly terrible and it caused me to get blisters on my feet. I have heard so many great things about TOMS, but these shoes were terrible and I never have issues with shoes. Just feel I lost my money completely bc I will never wear again.
customer_reviews.author: A. GaNun

customer_reviews.title: gentle on the heel pull
customer_reviews.text: The strap on the heal is likely just for looks. I've snapped mine after a short amount of use. Just be careful to loosen the laces each time you put them on and they should hold up better than my experience ;-) Super cute and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: They last six months at most
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much, I can't stop buying them. However, with that said, they get dirty incredibly fast and good luck cleaning them. You need to be okay with dirty shoes if you want to own these. They won't last you years, maybe six months at most before the bottom starts to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes LOOK exactly as they do in pictures. However, the fit is not great. They are stiff, tight, and uncomfortable. I returned them, as they are definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick T

customer_reviews.title: Really happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am girly, and only wear tennis shoes when I workout. These, however, go with almost everything. I like to pair them with anything from fitted sweatpants to jean shorts and a cute tank. I get compliments on them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. No support.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not as cute as pictured. They do not offer much support so definitely not meant for long days of being on your feet. They are a little wide for my narrow feet. I would not purchase these again but I’m keeping them for the reason that a pair of shoes are donated with each purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bignell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the drizzle grey women’s canvas sneaker 3 times, thinking the pair I received must be uniquely defective, but now I’m sure the quality is just poor. One pair arrived with the shoe laces broken, the other two pairs had the heel strap break in the first day’s wear. I wish the quality was better, because overall the shoe looks good and feels good, but unfortunately they fall apart quickly and consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & Best Buy on Amazon so far!
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff when you first wear them but they loosen up quickly. They aren't too warm but perfect summer shoe & extremely cute!! I always get compliments when I’m out wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in blue in store b/c didn't have grey in my size, went directly home and ordered grey. Wear them ALL THE TIME and donated barely worn blue when I moved recently. I wear these EVERYWHERE.
customer_reviews.author: B Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Why do these shoes cost so much?? They were uncomfortable and cheap feeling. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Capel

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, it took a bit to break in the back of the heels but i love them. I took them to europe and they were comfy as hell, except something the tip of my toes hurt after walking around too much.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Marceau

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and stylish! I love them! Wore them walking around shopping in the city all day and no foot pain or rubbing! Get them!
customer_reviews.author: CaraMia

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most uncomfortable pair of athletic shoes I’ve ever tried on. These felt like they were made of cardboard and were so stiff. A definite return for me, not worth the high cost whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: milwes

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look really cute online but when I put them on they just weren't what I was looking for. Still a very nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I’ve never ordered Toms before
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I’ve never ordered Toms before, and they just gained a customer. They’re cute, casual and super comfy. Love.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Vandenberg

customer_reviews.title: My second pair...I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: When I wore out my first pair, I ordered another. These go with everything and I get compliments all the time. Just don’t get the leather parts wet or they will bleed onto shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Laughner

customer_reviews.title: NOT the last pair I'll buy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes! Bought 1/2 size up to fit thicker socks or whatever but they fit sans socks so I'd suggest to order up in size. I've gotten so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: The product team packaged real well. They fit real comfortable and I love the color worth every penny !
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I work in healthcare and these are great and comfy for long shifts on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Canvas Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy right out of the box! They look really cute w/ jeans or shorts!
customer_reviews.author: WillWork4Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Shoes shoes shoes
customer_reviews.text: Other than the shoe fitting a bit big but nothing to uncomfortable the shoes are perfect! I has searched for a while some comfortable shoes I liked & would last & these have definitely put up quite a fight.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The run true to size, they are a little narrow but the fabric is forgiving enough that it makes up for that. Incredibly comfortable and look great! Another great TOMS product! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mira Rinder-Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Shoes you need!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I love Toms for teaching and for overall comfort!! Love the color and how they can be dressed up easily or with leggings!! Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I bought them for a trip to Amsterdam and I can already tell they’ll be great for walking/biking around the city!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and such a cute style. This will be my new work shoes (replacing my old ones which is a Nike free)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lee

customer_reviews.title: tooooo big!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down, and it was still too big by a good size and a half!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: These are low profile and very stylish. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Order Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is what I expected. They are very lightweight which is nice. The shoes did arrive damaged however, which is my complaint. The left shoe lace was almost severed in one spot, the fibers that make up the shoe lace were broken.
customer_reviews.author: CarL

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice casual shoe to have, needed a break from athletic shoes. Shoes are true to size and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoes, but tough to get on & off. After wearing them for about 2-3 hours at an event, my arches & heels were hurting pretty bad. Not what I really what I was looking for in a cute tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cook

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Narrow. High arch which the insole didn’t seem to fit right and there was a gap between the edge of the insole and the shoe and it did into my arch. Quality felt very flimsy for this being a tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not mad bout it
customer_reviews.text: Not as much support as I should have. Definitely feel it after a long day. But super cute, easy to clean, and go with pretty much anything!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Not what is shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Just got my shoes and unfortunately they are not what is shown in the picture. So a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Aaron Medina

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Shoe tore in an hour after first wear. Super cute shoes. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: brad byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but no support and only moderately comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice average shoe, but gets dirty very easily due to type of fabric it's made with. It's comfortable, but not excessively comfortable like my Nike tennis shoes. Very little support, but cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for style and walking
customer_reviews.text: Love the style! Shoe is stiffer than a running shoe but perfect for what I wanted them for. More for style!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: SO comfortable. I wore these babies for three days around Disneyland without hardly breaking them in, and I had no trouble at all. I also get complimented when I wear them, which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: kelly nichols

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the fit and color on these sneakers. true to size. Very comfortable. The back come sup high enough so its not rubbing against my ankle. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bayley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are both cute and comfortable, they run try to size
customer_reviews.author: Kate K

customer_reviews.title: pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: super cute shoes! Very comfy! The suede on the heel to help put it on is a bit thin and tore after a few days but other than that i’ve Had no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Make your feet look tiny. Start out a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Make your feet look tiny. Start out a little tight (as Toms normally do) and loosen up with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Tremea

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits like glove. Love them Nice materials, nice shoe. Super comfy and light!
customer_reviews.author: Reagin sweek

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 9 1/2 or 10 depending on shoe. A 10 for this. Very cute, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made or defective item?
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and fit of the shoe, but was really disappointed after wearing them just a few times the back pull up tab ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The part of the shoe that helps you pull the shoe on (in the back) broke the First time I put the shoes on. Poorly made. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite shoes! They are incredibly comfortable. Wore these while pregnant and they offered amazing support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$!
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a pair of Toms till now. Love them!! Fit is fabulous and true to size. Love the color! Very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Marjie A

customer_reviews.title: Flowers and feathers
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable and awesome! Makes your foot feel like it’s on a bed filled with flowers and feathers.
customer_reviews.author: Melody J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! So cute and comfortable! Wore them for a week walking around NYC and WA DC without getting sore feet!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are lightweight and very comfortable! True to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t need to size up
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews mentioned these run small, so I ordered a half size up. After breaking them in I don’t think that was necessary. Very cute shoes and relatively comfortable
customer_reviews.author: mgSD

customer_reviews.title: The perfect casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like that the shoes are really comfortable and go with any outfit for the casual look.
customer_reviews.author: Brunilda

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sneakers ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy. Fit perfect and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: So stylish and comfortable, I get alot of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: sarahs

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, very cute! I have received many compliments on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable even after two weeks of 6+ hours days of walking around Europe. Stylish and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and fit as expected. I was expecting that would be a little more padded but they are comfortable as they are.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Held up well to lots of walking. But, they run a little long and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: The back tab broke while trying to put my shoe on
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dauzat

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: The back ripped but other than that it was good
customer_reviews.author: Justin Stills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and get so many compliments on them!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! I have gotten so many compliments on them. They can be worn for comfort while dressing cute :)
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a birthday gift and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Major

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shows just a little small. Returning to get half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: The wide fit of these shoes is just right. ...
customer_reviews.text: The wide fit of these shoes is just right. I have worn them a hand full of times and they are stylish and lightweight. I am not sure how they will hold up in the long run, however, as they are just cloth shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!!! 0 stars. Would not let me not pick a star.
customer_reviews.text: I washed these shoes by hand. These shoes cannot even be worn now.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Ivanchan

product_meta.title: TOMS Cabrillo - Navy Chambray Mix - Trainers
product_meta.description: The Cabrillo Chambray Mix by Toms is the perfect shoe for everyday wear. With manmade soles and quality fabric, your feet will thank you for the comfort and style all day long. The classic look combined with comfort makes for the ultimate casual shoe. The Cabrillo Chambray Mix by Toms will be the perfect complement to your wardrobe.
feature_bullets: Fashion Trend: Ankle-High Fabric Walking Shoe
